content:
## n8n@0.87.0 For a comprehensive list of changes, check out the [commits](https://github.com/n8n-io/n8n/compare/n8n@0.86.1...n8n@0.87.0) for this version.
**Release date:** 2020-10-14 - New nodes - Automizy - AWS Rekognition - Matrix - Sendy - Vonage - WeKan - Enhanced nodes - AWS SES: Added Send Template operation for the Email resource and added the Template resource - ClickUp: Added Time Entry and Time Entry Tag resources - Function: The Function field is now called the JavaScript Code field - Mailchimp: Added Campaign resource - Mindee: Added currency to the simplified response - OneDrive: Added Share operation - OpenWeatherMap: Added Language parameter - Pipedrive: Added additional parameters to the Get All operation for the Note resource - Salesforce: Added Flow resource - Spreadsheet File: Added Range option for the Read from file operation - Bug Fixes - ClickUp Trigger: Fixed issue with creating credentials - Pipedrive Trigger: Fixed issue with adding multiple webhooks to Pipedrive - The link.fish Scrape node has been removed from n8n. For more details, check out the entry in the [breaking changes](https://github.com/n8n-io/n8n/blob/master/packages/cli/BREAKING-CHANGES.md#0870) page
